title: website: playground javascript fails at Unicode
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/McM0MDEPKL contains this program:

// You can edit this code!
// Click here and start typing.
package main

import "fmt"

func XXX(a, b int) int { return a+b }

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Hello, 世界")
}

For XXX, substitute U+1D6BA (mathematical bold capital sigma). It won't display well
here.

Play around with selecting the sigma. It does various things such as disappear
altogether, pop back again, make the line go away, and so on.
